title: Disconnecting
body:
My internet connection is fine for everything but this game, sometimes I DC as people are accepting/declining games and then it won't let me into champ select after pressing accept, when the connection comes back I have a 5 minute timer before I can search for games again for "leaving champ select". Basically when I'm in game it's fine, it just cuts in and out for a minute on and off while searching games.
Anyone know how to fix this problem?

replies.body: Update: the time-out for searching for games has gone up to 15 minutes...it's snowballing and I'm just trying to get into a champ select!!!
